title: Can somebody help me
body: My game doesn't update the client when i press Launch on the old client if someone knows how to fix this plz tell me.

replies.body: Your security settings might have changed, so it's blocking the client from launching.  Go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get that fixed up.  That should get you back in game!
